name: Standard Meeting Notes
description: A standard template for general meetings, focusing on key outcomes and actions.

sections.title: Summary
sections.instruction: Provide a brief, one-paragraph executive summary of the entire meeting.

sections.title: Key Decisions
sections.instruction: List the most important decisions made during the meeting.

sections.title: Action Items
sections.instruction: Extract ALL action items with SPECIFIC details: (1) Exact owner name/role (e.g., 'Two developers', 'Designer', 'QA team') - NEVER use 'No blocker' or 'None', (2) Clear task description with task/ticket ID if mentioned (e.g., PROJ-404), (3) Specific deadline (date/time like 'by noon today', '3 PM', 'Friday' - not 'None' or 'TBD'), (4) Priority level if mentioned, (5) Dependencies if mentioned. If owner/deadline not mentioned in transcript, write 'Not specified' - NEVER use 'No blocker', 'None', or 'TBD'. Always add reference transcript segment and timestamp in the table.
sections.item_format:
| **Owner** | Task | Due | Reference Transcript Segment | Segment Time stamp |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
sections.example_item_format:
Good example: | Two developers | Fix Stripe webhook (PROJ-404) | Before noon today | (Transcript segment) | (Timestamp) |
Bad example: | No blocker | Stripe debugging continues | None | (Transcript Chunk 6) | (Transcript Chunk 12-18) |

sections.title: Discussion Highlights
sections.instruction: Summarize the main topics of discussion, key arguments, and important insights.
